message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to me is at least $1500000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I look forward to hearing back from you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique item. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $1000000 on this product. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to meet my maximum spending limit?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1400000. This is a significant discount from my initial offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
